title: Swiss Rösti (Veg)
description: Crispy pan-fried potato rösti, simple and comforting.
steps: Season with salt (and onion if using).
Pan-fry on medium heat until golden on both sides.

title: Simple Dal (Veg)
steps: Rinse lentils and boil with water, salt, turmeric.
Temper cumin and garlic in oil, add to cooked lentils.

title: Chicken Teriyaki (Non-veg)
description: Quick pan-seared chicken with a sweet savory glaze.
steps: Reduce sauce until glossy and coats chicken.
